attributes.action: Add the American Bully XL dogs to the list of banned dog breeds in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This new breed of dog has been killing UK citizens of all ages, over the past few years. This dog should have been banned by now. Under John Major, this dog would have been recognised as a pit-bull-type dog and would have been banned by now. Please avoid more deaths from happening, by banning this dangerous dog NOW.
attributes.background: Amend 'The Dangerous Dogs Act 1991' by adding the new breed: American Bully XL and XXL dogs to the list of banned dog breeds in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631449
